scripts.ios:build:device: MAC_IP=$(./scripts/detect-mac-ip.sh) && echo "Detected Mac IP: $MAC_IP" && echo "$MAC_IP" > ios/DocScanPro3Temp/MacIP.txt && xcodebuild -workspace ios/DocScanPro3Temp.xcworkspace -scheme DocScanPro3Temp -configuration Debug -destination 'generic/platform=iOS' -derivedDataPath ios/build USER_DEFINED_MAC_IP="$MAC_IP" -allowProvisioningUpdates
scripts.ios:install:device: bash -lc 'APP=$(ls -d ios/build/Build/Products/Debug-iphoneos/*.app | head -n 1); xcrun devicectl device install app --device 00008110-000A30490244801E "$APP"; xcrun devicectl device process launch --device 00008110-000A30490244801E com.stepanpanko.docscanpro3temp'
scripts.ios:dev:device: pnpm ios:kill:metro && sleep 1 && (pnpm metro > /tmp/metro.log 2>&1 &) && ./scripts/wait-for-metro.sh && pnpm ios:build:device && pnpm ios:install:device
